00008 int main()

00010     static char sock_file[] = "/tmp/simple-socket_test.sock";
00011     static char send_msg[] = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog";
00012     static char recv_msg[sizeof(send_msg)];
00013     static size_t len = sizeof(send_msg);
00014 
00015     try {
00016 
00017     // Test datagram specific calls
00018     UnixDatagramSocket send_socket;
00019     UnixDatagramSocket recv_socket;
00020     send_socket.bind(sock_file);
00021     recv_socket.bind(sock_file);
00022     std::string source;
00023 
00024     send_socket.sendTo( send_msg, len, sock_file);
00025     recv_socket.receiveFrom( recv_msg, len, source);
00026 
00027     if( source != sock_file) return 1;
00028     if( recv_socket.timedReceiveFrom( recv_msg, len, source, 10) != 0) return 1;
00029 
00030     // source must not be changed
00031     if( source != sock_file) return 1;
00032     if( std::memcmp( send_msg, recv_msg, len) < 0) return 1;
00033     std::memset( recv_msg, 0, len);
00034 
00035     ::unlink(sock_file);
00036 
00037     // no errors in this testcase
00038     } catch( const SocketException& e)
00039     {
00040         std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00041         std::cerr << e.errorCode() << std::endl;
00042         return 1;
00043     }
